overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a strong social media presence across multiple platforms, including Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky. With a combined total of 3,580 followers and diverse content themes focused on computational social science and disinformation, his posts receive notable engagement, particularly on LinkedIn.

contentThemes.description: Exploration of methods and discussions around detecting disinformation and coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media.
Updates on research grants, publications, and opportunities in computational social science.
Posts about hiring and opportunities for researchers in fields related to social media analysis.

recommendations: Increase frequency of posts on Bluesky to capitalize on engagement potential.
Utilize more multimedia content to enhance engagement across platforms.

platformInsights.mastodon: Posts on Mastodon related to disinformation methodologies generate consistent engagement, suggesting a well-targeted audience.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn posts have the highest engagement rate, particularly those announcing research successes and job opportunities.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
